Dashboard Summary
config.content:
Welcome to the Linux Overview Dashboard!

Overview dashboards provide quick and easy access to high-level metrics that facilitate rapid issue identification and resolution. As you add Linux devices, this dashboard will auto-populate with vital statistics about their health and activity.

The Best Alert is ... No Alert!
config.content:
Welcome to the Alerts Overview Dashboard!

The Alerts Overview Dashboard is designed to provide quick access to high-level alert status that facilitates rapid issue identification and resolution. As alerts are triggered within your environment, this dashboard will auto-populate and bring your attention to the critical issues that matter to you.

dashboards.description: Status and critical metrics of your LogicMonitor Collectors.

config.name: Dashboard Summary
config.content:
Welcome to the Collector Overview Dashboard!

As you add LogicMonitor Collectors to your account, this dashboard will provide vital statistics about Collector activity and health.
